exceptions.columnOrDefaultValueIsRequired: Column or Default should be filled.
exceptions.wrongFieldsNumber: For search the amount of source fields should be the same as the amount of related entity fields.
exceptions.wrongIntermediateFieldsNumber: For insert/update the amount of source fields should be the same as the amount of related entity fields.

tooltips.column: This(these) field value(s) will be used to search if related data record already exists.
tooltips.intermediateColumn: This(these) field value(s) will be used to create/update related data record.
